content: Xuehai Zhou Toggle navigation Xuehai Zhou Home Publications Teaching Links Curriculum Vitae Address University of Science and Technology of China 1129 Huizhou Road, Hefei, Anhui, P.R.China, 230052 +86-551-63601556 63492149 xhzhou[at]ustc.edu.cn Professor School of Computer Science and Technology School of Software Engineering University of Science and Technology of China Welcome I am a Professor in the School of Computer Science and Technology and the School of Software Engineering at the University of Science and Technology of China. These days, I am researching on reconfigurable computing, distributed Computing and embedded system. Currently Teaching 01113502 Computer Architecture, Spring2021 Our Labs Embedded System Lab, ESLab
